short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How many colored squares can you count?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
COLOR SPoTT v1.1:

In 20 seconds count as many colors as you can to advance to the next level.

The higher the level, the more difficult the game becomes.

Play until your brain is firing on all cylinders!
